tool.name: BigWig to Wig
tool.help:
This tool converts a **BigWig** file to fixed step **Wiggle** format. Resolution is controlled through the bin size (the higher the size, the lower the resolution).
The script this tool is based on is written by Jens Vilstrup Johansen and uses bigWigInfo_ and bigWigSummary_.
.. _bigWigInfo: https://github.com/adamlabadorf/ucsc_tools/blob/master/executables/bigWigInfo .. _bigWigSummary: https://github.com/adamlabadorf/ucsc_tools/blob/master/executables/bigWigSummary
